Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/54th
ShortDescription: 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 55th, Kedzie, 51st, then resume their normal route on California.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near California/54th.

Headline: Trains bypassing Washington/Wabash Station
ShortDescription: Loop 'L' trains are running, and will continue to bypass Washington/Wabash station due to due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop 'L' trains are running, and will continue to bypass Washington/Wabash station due to due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines These may include:

  • #3 King Drive
  • #4 Cottage Grove
  • #6 Jackson Park Express
  • #20 Madison
  • #22 Clark
  • #60 Blue Island/26th
  • #62 Archer 
  • Red Line and Blue Line trains

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Roosevelt and Clark/Lake in both directions.

We apology for this temporary inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

Allow extra travel time.
